PerfectNetExp.abs: 以u开头的英语英文单词 ... untruth 不真实,虚伪,谎言 untruthfulness 虚伪 unusable 无法使用的.
untruthful 不正确的, untruthfulness 失实, untruthful 假的

list.abs: This painting gave people an untruth impression ., 这幅画给人不真实的印象.
That ' s an untruthful description ., 那是一个不真实的记述.
It is a untruth to say that happy is the nation that has no history ., 说没有历史的民族是幸福的民族 , 这是卑劣的谎言.
He never told an untruth in his life ., 他有生以来从来没有说过一句假话.

auth_sentence.content: When I asked them to give me examples of her lies, they were at a loss, but adhered to their conviction of her untruthfulness.
